explanation: [0-0] A young man with glasses and a black T-shirt is sitting facing left with his right arm bent on the table. A beige chair is on his right. A painting is hanging on the wall. There are some objects on the brown table below.

[0-3] Then, the man in the black T-shirt picks up a pancake with his right hand, lifts it to his mouth and opens his mouth wide. Immediately afterward, a pair of chopsticks holding some food appear from the left and place the food on the pancake in front of the man's mouth. The man in the black T-shirt closes his mouth and swallows the pancake and food together.
